subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ loss was the ninth in their last 12 games. Mike Pelfrey gave up five runs in six innings, and the Mets’ poor fielding led to two errors.
snippet: The Mets’ loss was the ninth in their last 12 games. Mike Pelfrey gave up five runs in six innings, and the Mets’ poor fielding led to two errors.
